title: Possible Kalista Improvement?
body: I had a though about Kalista and the champion she bounds to, that maybe if her soulbound champion disconnects and leaves the game, then Kalista would be able to re-cast The Black Spear on another champion but not the one that had disconnected while being bound previously. It could be as if the one that disconnects has betrayed Kalista, hence why she can't re-cast on the same champion. As it is now, it is a little stupid because if the soulbound champion disconnects, then Kalista effectively doesn't have an Ultimate to use.

replies.body: You can rebuy it in the store {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
The black spear is on sale in the shop, but cannot bind/unbind. Buying the spear will not allow you to bind to another person, nor can you stop being oathsworn.
